title: Hour 1 - Ron Rivera (07-24-20)
itunes:title: Hour 1 - Ron Rivera (07-24-20)
description:
Thursday was an eventful day in sports for changes to professional team nicknames. Ron Rivera, head coach of the newly-dubbed Washington Football Team, joins to discuss the evolving identity of the team's brand. Also, baseball is back!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
